stix:Incident.incident:Title: A patient received an appointment list in error. The patient requested a list of his appointments from a Medical Support Assistant (MSA) in Behavioral Health. The MSA printed the appointment schedule, gathered documents from printer and provided the patient the information. After the patient departed, the patient realized they were also given a copy of a Staff Psychologist's clinic schedule in error. The clinic schedule listed the appointment information for two other patients. The patient returned the document to the Staff Psychologist at the next scheduled appointment. The Staff Psychologist stated the patient had advised the Staff Psychologist that the information was not shared with anyone. The Operations Manager in Behavioral Health was notified of the incident and stated the Behavioral Health Service Director will be informed. The clinic schedule and details of incident were provided to the Privacy Officer. The list had names, dates of birth, and social security numbers.

xpil:PartyName.xnl:NameLine: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
